snippet: Newt Gingrich’s campaign is pinning its hopes on Super Tuesday and a proportional share of delegates despite a scarcity of debates until late February.
abstract: Newt Gingrich’s Republican presidential campaign is pinning its hopes on Super Tuesday and a proportional share of delegates despite a scarcity of debates until late February; his loss in Florida was a profound rejection of his candidacy, and pressure could mount on him to drop his insurgency bid.

byline.original: By KATHARINE Q. SEELYE and TRIP GABRIEL

lead_paragraph: Newt Gingrich’s campaign is pinning its hopes on Super Tuesday and a proportional share of delegates despite a scarcity of debates until late February.

headline.seo: Gingrich Pins Hopes on Super Tuesday and Delegate Shares
headline.main: States Ahead Offer Defiant Gingrich a Chance to Regain a Foothold
headline.print_headline: States Ahead Offer Defiant Gingrich a Chance to Regain a Foothold
